about_the_game:
Enter the hilariously unique world of Dough Slapping: A Touch to Desire, where Mark’s ordinary life as a baker turns into an epic tale of passion, humor, and personal growth—all centered around the simple yet profound act of slapping dough. Experience a game where every action counts and where the left and right-handed slaps bring their own flair to Mark’s journey.

This is not your typical simulator—this is a storytelling adventure wrapped in doughy goodness. Follow Mark’s increasingly absurd obsession and reflections as he navigates the highs and lows of life, all while engaging in the rhythmic, oddly satisfying act of dough slapping.

Key Features:

  • Simple Yet Addictive Mechanics: Master the art of the perfect slap, choosing between left-hand and right-hand strikes, each with its own comedic animation and sound effects.

  • Engaging Narrative: Immerse yourself in Mark’s evolving story, where every slap pushes him closer to unexpected realizations about life, love, and dough.

  • Quirky Dialogue and Humor: Delight in Mark’s monologues and internal debates as he interacts with his dough, with meme-worthy moments and laugh-out-loud lines.

  • Dynamic Dough Reactions: Experience how the dough responds to your slaps, adding a layer of personality to each interaction and keeping gameplay fresh and amusing.

  • Replayable Content: Discover different paths and dialogues based on your slap timing and patterns, leading to unique Mark reactions and outcomes.

Gameplay Mechanics:

  • Left-Hand Slap & Right-Hand Slap: The only actions you’ll need for endless fun. Alternate between left and right to create your own rhythm, or slap as hard as you can to get different reactions from Mark and the dough.

  • Satisfying Feedback: Each slap comes with its own tactile sound and animation, making each interaction immersive and enjoyable.

  • Mark’s Reactions: As you play, Mark’s monologues and commentary change, giving insight into his thoughts and sometimes leading to unexpected, hilarious outcomes.

Experience the true power of a slap in Dough Slapping: A Touch to Desire and find out why Mark’s bond with dough is deeper than anyone could imagine.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: N/A
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: N/A
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660, ATI 7950 or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760, AMD Radeon R9 270X, or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit) or Newer (64 bit) Windows OS
  • Processor: 3.0+ GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 2060, AMD Radeon RX 6700, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Enter the quirky world of Dough Slapping: A Touch to Desire, where you slap dough with your left or right hand. Join Mark's journey filled with humor, heartfelt monologues, and unexpected revelations as you master the art of the perfect slap in this unique and comedic simulator.
